PublishedNuget.Name: FubuMVC.Authentication.Serenity
PublishedNuget.Description: Reusable LoginScreenFixture for projects that use FubuMVC.Authentication

PublishedNuget.Description: Run FubuMVC applications using Katana and OWIN

PublishedNuget.Description: Quickly bootstrap FubuLocalization inside a FubuMVC application

PublishedNuget.Description: A simple recipe for adding forms based membership persistence to a FubuMVC application

PublishedNuget.Description: Drop in persistence with RavenDb for FubuMVC / StructureMap applications

PublishedNuget.Description: Support for using the Razor view engine within a FubuMVC application.

PublishedNuget.Name: FubuMVC.Spark
PublishedNuget.Description: Support for using the Spark view engine within a FubuMVC application.

PublishedNuget.Name: Serenity
PublishedNuget.Description: Giving you piece of mind by making it easy to integrate both Storyteller and Jasmine testing into your FubuMVC applications
